node.description: Implements various control and monitoring functions of the Optohybrid
FMM won't wait for bc0 to start sending trigger
Local BXN counter offset (starting value at resync)
Pulse to take a counter snapshot
Set to 1 to disable snapshots (counters will be readout asynchronously
Control the soft reset of the Optohybrid FPGA
Connects to the trigger control module
Set programmable oneshot deadtime which applies to retriggers on individual VFAT channels
Select a VFAT which will connect to the S-bit multiplexer (for readout from chipscope)
Adjusts a FIFO address to align the 40MHz frame to the s-bit data
24 bit list of VFATs with hits in this BX
Overflow Counter (more than 8 clusters in a bx)
24 bit list of VFATs with stable Start-of-frame pulses (in sync for a number of clock cycles)
24 bit list of VFATs with unstable Start-of-frame pulses (became misaligned after already achieving lock)
Number of link errors required in the ISERDES to vote for shifting to a new sample phase
Number of link consecutive good frames required to reset the err_cnt_to_shift counter
Number of link consecutive good frames required before the transmission unit is marked as good and S-bits can be produced
Set to 1 to invert the S-bit SoT Frame
Set to 1 to invert the S-bit
Set to 1 to invert the S-bit
Set to 1 to invert the S-bit
Set to 1 to invert the S-bit
Set to 1 to invert the S-bit

Set to 1 to invert the S-bit
1=counters will persist until manually reset; 0=counters will automatically reset at CNT_TIME
Number of BX that the VFAT S-bit counters will count to before automatically resetting to zero
Value of the GBT tx elink0 bitslip adjuster to align data to the 40MHz clock
Value of the GBT tx elink1 bitslip adjuster to align data to the 40MHz clock
Number of wishbone responses sent back
GBT TX READY from GBTx Chip
Sets the transmitter into a sync mode where it sends a predictable pattern
GBT TX IODELAY in 78 ps steps, 0-31
GBT RX READY from GBTx Chip
GBT RX VALID from GBTx Chip
Number of GBT link errrors detected
